reviewText: Excellent history on The Tower of London.  I knew a little about it, like queens and the princes being held there, and it was very interesting to learn about the other parts of the Tower.
it was informative  and very interesting and intelligently put together and it held your interest from beginning to end and worth viewing several times
Love British history, but this was very boring...holding out hopes for "Secrets of the Tower of London" that comes out Dec 3, 2013.

We've been to the Tower twice & this film is the full tour given by the Beefeaters.  You will receive the Tower's (& a lot of London's) history w/maps & graphics of both  It was like being in the tour group again!  This is a captivating presentation of one of the world's great monuments & I HIGHLY recommend it  to any one interested in London -- it's "almost" like being there.

If you've been to the Tower of London, or are planning to go, this DVD is very good.  It even shows the Crown Jewels... we LOVED seeing them as well as the rest of the exhibits here.

The Tower of London was our favorite attraction in London. Allow several hours minimum to see it all.  It's possible to spend an entire day here in and around the Tower of London.
